title: mpe.in
description: The `mpe.in` object processes raw MIDI data, specifically designed for MPE (MIDI Polyphonic Expression) input. It outputs common MIDI messages like Note On/Off, Channel Pressure, Slide, and Pitch Bend, prepended with a voice number for routing. It can receive input from an internal MIDI device or an external raw MIDI source, with an option to listen exclusively to the external input.
